John Cole was a Titan of the BBC - and a great political reporter. You can hear my tribute to him on @BBCNews at 6pm.
Since 1945, we #Europeans have made war between ourselves unthinkable. #Churchill helped lay the foundations for this.
#Churchill was a man of foresight with an acute sense of history, often ahead of prevailing opinion.
On 19 September 1946, here in #Zurich, #Churchill put forward his "astonishing" proposal for "a kind of United States of Europe".
We will not rest on these laurels. We will not pull up the drawbridges.
Europe is and remains an economic giant.
This success story shows that individual interests are better protected by acting together through common institutions.
The euro is one of our most significant achievements, the most visible symbol of European economic and political integration.
Enlargement is a geostrategic project of first order, about extending our Union's impact and influence – in our very own interest.
In the age of globalisation, sovereignty pooled means power gained - for every member of the European Union, and not power lost.
The European values and way of life are also defended by others like Switzerland as a proud member of the democratic European family.
The fish is sometimes the last one to understand that it is living in the water!
Pro-#European forces need to take the lead & not leave the initiative in the hands of the doomsayers & false prophets. Leadership matters.
This deeper Union does not mean more centralization. It means that we should better concentrate EU action on the real issues that matter.
Not everything needs a solution at European level and we need to take extra care of the quantity and quality of our regulation.
Decisions we make today will determine for many years whether #Europe remains an area of stability, shared prosperity and #freedom.
